Crap game, Motherfucking Dick, I really fucked your horse, and the next steam version will be calling you a loser. Balance a piece of shit, make the other teams have to play the same bullshit lineup, take away two teams, and the game is dying. PVE is a piece of shit, promised to have a skill tree or something, all give you nothing than a mean word cut. Hero bar zzzq, in order to attract traffic without limits, suddenly make various Overwatch characters LGBT even if. A hero that no one's ever gonna play for the sake of political correctness, and now he's a piece of shit that can't be beaten or killed standing in a crowd. And then I fucked up your fucking Chinese server. Finally, I want to explain the meaning of the Overwatch icon to the fire: Baked Dick I wish you had died
Takes everything bad about Overwatch 1 and makes it worse.
O que foi feito com esse jogo deveria ser um crime

The game itself is fun.
